H0.text: In Greek mythology, who fell in love with his own statue of a woman. Daedalus

H1.text: In Greek mythology, who fell in love with his own statue of a woman. Hephaestus

H2.text: In Greek mythology, who fell in love with his own statue of a woman. Orpheus

H3.text: In Greek mythology, who fell in love with his own statue of a woman. Pygmalion

A4.text: Pygmalion fell in love with a statue he carved, which he named Galatea.

A5.text: Aphrodite granted Pygmalion's wish, turning the ivory statue into a living woman.
